mapper.select:
select COUNT(*) from seminar where 1=1
AND seminartitle LIKE concat(concat('%',#{seminar.seminartitle}),'%')

select
from seminar where 1=1
AND seminartitle LIKE concat(concat('%',#{seminar.seminartitle}),'%')
limit #{startNo},#{pageSize}

mapper.update:
update seminar
seminarpic = #{seminarpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seminartitle = #{seminartitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sharebrief = #{sharebrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seminartarget = #{seminartarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where seminarid = #{seminarid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update seminar set seminarid = #{seminarid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, seminarpic = #{seminarpic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seminartitle = #{seminartitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sharebrief = #{sharebrief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seminartarget = #{seminartarget,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createuserid = #{createuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
